channel.title: How do I add a lever. [Delta]
channel.description:
How do I add a lever, I know how to make it tele, but not how to add the actual object. It wont show if I do the reg makeglobelobject thing
Can anyone help? Thanks

item.title: How do I add a lever. [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @TerrAE TerrÆ
item.description:
@TerrAE wrote:

Search in Client.java for

public void NewObjects() {

and then add

	       makeGlobalObject(2737, 3477, 6951, -1, 0);

The first numbers are the ID then you have the X and Y and… you should probly dont edit -1, 0

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add a lever. [Delta]
